pr_title: Prevent null pointer exception in MultiSourceTrackingToken

timeline.message: Tracking token may be null for a specific source. Position needs to handle this.

timeline.bodyText:
This can still lead to a NPE, when trackingTokenEntry is null, but that has a non-null entry.
Consider using Object.equals(x, y) in the already existing if statement, instead of x.equals(y)
timeline.author: abuijze

timeline.message: Simplified comparing tokens per string using Object.equals().
